ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ogre faction and training near freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: My friend.. she has to go back to Oggok.  Just plan out her levels when she needs to train and take trips back for training purposes.  Since most skills
ygData.messageBody:
My friend.. she has to go back to Oggok. Just plan out her levels when she
needs to train and take trips back for training purposes. Since most skills
require only 1 point normally it works out just fine.

I once tried that on a PVP Team server. Ran my lvl one troll through the
swamp - sro - oasis - nro - ecommons - nek forest to find out nobody would
train me =(. Oh well.. There might be some way to train it up, or gain
enough faction to. However most of those factions require quest - from
those that dont like you in the first place.

-----Original Message-----
From: Knight [mailto:knight@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 11, 2000 4:52 PM
To: everquest@egroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Ogre faction and training near freeport?



Hi all,

I just got a friend into EQ (Is it just me or does anyone else seem to
picture that Truth tobacco commercial ads with body bags whenever you
introduce a new victu...er, player to EQ? >:-) ). She's decided to start
an Ogre warrioress with green hair (She liked the green hair for some
reason),
and I brought her all the way to freeport.

Since i've never played an evil factioned race before, i have no idea
where
she should go to train her skills. We found she can get into Neriak to
buy/sell
and bank, but the warriors guild there won't train her. We also tried that

barbarian warrior under east freeport.

Does any know where she can train near Neriak or freeport? Or does she
have
to travel all the way back to Ogguk? Also any tips on what she can do to
help
her faction so she can get into the freeport city would be appreciated!


Thanks,
-Sceadu
Lvl 6 (Human) Shadow Knight
Tunare




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
